mapper.select: select distinct p.* from plan p left join plan_receive r on p.plan_no = r.plan_receive_plan_no where p.plan_sender_no = #{memberNo} or r.plan_receive_receiver_no = #{memberNo} order by p.plan_start_time desc
select * from plan where plan_sender_no = #{memberNo} and plan_type='개인' order by plan_start_time asc

select distinct p.* from plan p left join plan_receive r on p.plan_no = r.plan_receive_plan_no where p.plan_type = '팀' and (p.plan_sender_no = #{memberNo} or r.plan_receive_receiver_no = #{memberNo}) order by p.plan_start_time asc
mapper.update: update plan set plan_status = #{planStatus} where plan_no = #{planNo}
